jules-arch-cleanup.title: Codebase Architecture Cleanup (Phase 1 Fixes)
jules-arch-cleanup.instruction_raw: Execute the immediate actions defined in Section 8 of the spec: Fix `utils.logger` imports in tests and scan for other breakages.

td-crit-float-settle.title: TD-CRIT-FLOAT-SETTLE: Fix Critical Float Leak in Settlement
td-crit-float-settle.instruction_raw: Analyze and fix the critical float leak in SettlementSystem. Ensure all inputs to transfers are cast to int. Reference SPEC_TD_CRIT_FLOAT_SETTLE.md.

td-arch-sec-god.title: TD-ARCH-SEC-GOD: Implement God-Mode Authentication
td-arch-sec-god.instruction_raw: Implement mandatory token-based authentication for all GodCommandDTO inputs in the WebSocket server. Reference SPEC_TD_ARCH_SEC_GOD.md.

td-int-pennies-fragility.title: TD-INT-PENNIES-FRAGILITY: Remove Penny-Float Duality
td-int-pennies-fragility.instruction_raw: Complete the Penny migration for all Telemetry DTOs. Remove hasattr(agent, 'xxx_pennies') wrappers and enforce strict integer usage. Reference SPEC_TD_INT_PENNIES_FRAGILITY.md.

jules-track-a-settlement.title: Track A: Settlement & Logic Purity (TD-CRIT-FLOAT-SETTLE)
jules-track-a-settlement.instruction_raw: Refactor engines to return int pennies and update Firm protocols. Follow SPEC_TRACK_A_SETTLEMENT.md.

jules-track-b-security.title: Track B: Security & Infra Hardening (TD-ARCH-SEC-GOD)
jules-track-b-security.instruction_raw: Update ServerConfigDTO and SimulationServer for localhost binding. Follow SPEC_TRACK_B_SECURITY.md.
